title: SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali | Support
description: Frequently asked questions and resources dedicated to support for the digital notification service SEND

heading.title: Do you need help?
heading.subtitle: Consult the answers to the frequently asked questions about the digital notification service SEND or discover the resources dedicated to citizens and companies or the sending institutions.

infoblock.title: We are here for you
infoblock.description: Did you not find the answer you were looking for? Write us, sending a request for support or call the contact center.

email.description_3: : include useful information such as the univocal code of the notification (IUN).
